episodes.title: ALLURE BACKSTAGE S09: DARK EYELINER
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby reports on the TOP 5 THINGS YOU NEED FOR SPRING. Black and brown rimmed eyes provide contrast to spring's pretty, colorful dresses. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE BACKSTAGE S09: RED LIPSTICK
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby reports on the TOP 5 THINGS YOU NEED FOR SPRING. Lip colors normally reserved for cold months look fresh with pink blush and spring styles. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE BACKSTAGE S09: FAKE LASHES
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby reports on the TOP 5 THINGS YOU NEED FOR SPRING. Though the snakeskin bags and diamond necklaces seen on the runways were the real deal, the eyelashes were often fake. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE BACKSTAGE S09: HIGHLIGHTER
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby reports on the TOP 5 THINGS YOU NEED FOR SPRING. Subtle shimmer on the eyes, cheeks, and lids defines features and makes skin glow. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE BACKSTAGE S09: BROWN SHADOW
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby reports on the TOP 5 THINGS YOU NEED FOR SPRING. Soft brown shadow on the lids and along the lower lashes enhances eyes without looking heavy. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby goes backstage at Burberry in Milan and gets a first look at the hair and makeup. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE: The Look of Marc Jacobs Spring 2009
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby goes backstage at Marc Jacobs in New York and gets a first look at the hair and makeup.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: ALLURE: The Look of Michael Kors Spring 2009
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure Beauty Editor Victoria Kirby goes backstage at Michael Kors in New York and gets a first look at the hair and makeup.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Pretty Tough
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: The gutsiest look combined heavy black around the eyes (or on the lips) with matte skin and hair that was slicked back or loose and shaggy.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Modern Romantic
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: The tender moments on the fall runways were hardly of the Hallmark variety. Red lips suddenly seemed daring when paired with smoky brown eyes or with a tight hairdo. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Pure Gold
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Gold provided a softer alternative to the makeup seen at so many shows. Lids were and cheeks were gilded in shades of yellow, bronze, and copper-gold. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Pop Art
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Color didn't tiptoe its way into fall makeup?it burst through in vivacious yellow, blue, and pink shades on lids and lips. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Ice Queen
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Even pale makeup had a biting edge. Icy white and silver shadows worn with fleshy pink lip colors gave models a steely quality. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Flashback
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: With cases of false eyelashes, teasing combs, and enough bottles of Elnett to primp the cast of Hairspray, the pros reinvented the '60s bombshell. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Minamalism
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: When the clothes were embellished or masculine, the beauty experts relied on little more than paddle brushes and nude makeup. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Pullled Back Hair
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Some of the ponytails, buns and braids were slickened to the head, others to casual they looked like they'd been slept on. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Colorful Shadows
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Bright eyes in nearly every shade of the rainbow run the gamut from soft to full on glittery.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Textured Hair
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: It's a tease. Rough hair styles with volume complement this season's textured clothes. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Deep Red Lips
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: No doubt. Crimson lips are daring. To pull them off for day, pat them on with your fingertip. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Matte Pink Lipstick
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: For lips with a healthy dose of attitude, try a matte formula in a pretty shade of pink. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Messy Updos
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Proof that updo's don't have to be done uptight. This season's easy undone buns. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Black Liner
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Use a heavy hand to create deliberately, imperfect rock and roll eyeliner. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Gold Shadow
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Bronzy-gold lids tempered with rich brown shadows add a glamorous tough to neutral makeup.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Matte Skin
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Foundation and powder create the illusion of flawless skin, the starting point for nearly every look this season.Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Power Lines
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Go behind the scenes of Allure's shoot with Julia Stegner modeling the best of fall fashion collections. Plus get bonus beauty and style tips from the experts who created the looks. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV PRODUCTION.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Sally Hershberger
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Sally Hershberger may be the world's most outspoken stylist. The reality show Shear Genius gives her a forum for mouthing off. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV Production.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Metallic Eyes
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Gold and silver shadow are striking. Executive Produced and Directed by Karen Morrison. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Headbands
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: A headband adds femininity in a quick way. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Bouncy Ponytails
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Sleek in front, curled in back, and wrapped at the base, these styles have maximum swing. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Full Lashes
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: False lashes create a wide-eyed innocence. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Flawless Skin
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: The face is perfectly finished and fresh. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Nude Lips
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Nude lips look polished, not fussed over. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Simple Updo
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Messy Knots have a lived in feel. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Pink Lips
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Shades of petal rose or fuchsia complement muted eye makeup. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Shimmery Shadow
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Shimmery Shadow. A veil of soft color gives the eyes a natural glow. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Contoured Cheeks
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Brown blush creates the illusion of cheekbones. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Supermodels
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Linda Evangelista, Stephanie Seymour, Helena Christensen, Shalom Harlow and Cindy Crawford shoot for Allure Magazine's 15th Anniversary issue. A MODTV Production.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: Get Great Hair
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Celebrity Hairstylist Garren gives his advice on how to get the best haircut. Get his insider advice in this exclusive video and don't forget to check out Allure Magazine for solutions to all your hair concerns. A MODTV Production.

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: The Body Electra
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Allure made over Carmen Electra, most often considered a sex symbol, in all three styles—cute, pretty, and sexy. Go behind the scenes of her Allure shoot and check out her photos in the July issue of the magazine. A MODTV Production

episodes.title: Allure Backstage: The Naked Truth
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: Check out Allure's shoot with five Hollywood actresses who bare their bodies—and a bit of their souls. A MODTV Production.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #6
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: BUDGET YOUR CALORIES. Spring/Summer 2006. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Budget Your Calories. How to eat more on your diet without feeling deprived. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Produced by News Out Loud.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #5
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: LEARN FROM SLIPS. Spring/Summer 2006. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Learn From Slips. Don't let slipups end your diet. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Produced by News Out Loud.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #4
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: OVERCOME EMOTIONAL EATING. Spring/Summer 2006. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Prevent overeating when you're stressed, upset, or bored. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Produced by News Out Loud.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #3
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: THINK HISTORICALLY. Spring/Summer 2006. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Examine and learn from your eating habits and diet history achieve weight-loss success. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Produced by News Out Loud.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #2
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: TAKE CONTROL. Spring/Summer 2006: Follow three women in Allure magazine every month as they transform their bodies with advice from diet, fitness, and beauty experts. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Plan what and when you'll eat to prevent cravings. Produced by News Out Loud.

episodes.title: Total Makeover Episode #1
episodes.author: modtv@mac.com (ALLURE.COM)
episodes.summary: CREATE A DIET STRATEGY. Spring/Summer 2006. Weight-loss coach Stephen Gullo offers his best tips for staying motivated. This episode: Create a weight-loss strategy. Start your own Total Makeover at allure.com. Produced by News Out Loud.
